name: Thanh Tung

services.title: UI/UX Design
services.description: I'm responsible for the design and implementation of all the experiences a user has when interacting with a digital tool, such as a website.

services.title: Web Develop
services.description: Using knowledge of programming to code user-side applications, including visual elements, overall layout of websites or web applications. I create user-friendly web pages, maintain and improve websites, optimize applications for speed, collaborate with back-end developers and web designers to improve usability, get feedback from, and build solutions for users and customers.

aboutpara: I am a Front-end Developer with 6 months experience at FPT University in designing and building up commercial and personal websites for users. Passionate about learning and development with a desire to apply skills on a larger development team at business. Eager to tackle more complex problems and continue to find ways to maximize user efficiency.

resume.description: Front-end Developer with 6 months experience at FPT University in designing and building up commercial and personal websites for users. Passionate about learning and development with a desire to apply skills on a larger development team at business. Eager to tackle more complex problems and continue to find ways to maximize user efficiency.

experiences.bullets: Design UI/UX, Working with React, Manage team project
Design UI/UX, Working with React, Manage team project (deploy and timeline)
